remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設實作方法呼叫方法的對應控制項配接器接著可以呼叫回方法或方法進行控制，或建立其本身裝置特定樣板化的 UI。The default implementation of the method calls the method of the corresponding control adapter, which in turn can either call back the method or the method for the control, or create its own device-specific templated UI.

returns.span: 如果事件已處理，否則為 。

span.span: if the event was handled; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接收回傳事件通知，檢查事件是否為配接器特定時，是由控制項呼叫這個方法。This method is called by a control when it receives a postback event notification, to check whether the event is adapter-specific. 如果控制項實作方法，並接收回傳事件，呼叫方法的控制項配置器。If the control implements the method and receives a postback event, the method of the control adapter is called. 如果傳送至控制項的事件可能會不同，視目標裝置而定，必須呼叫這個方法的控制項實作控制項配接器的方法。If events sent to the control can vary depending on the target device, the control implementation of this method must call the method of the control adapter. 這個方法會傳回`true`或`false`，這表示裝置配接器是否處理事件。This method returns `true` or `false`, indicating whether the device adapter handled the event. 它會傳回`false`預設。It returns `false` by default.

span.span: the postback data is invalid.

summary.span: 字串常數，用在回傳事件引數中表示瀏覽器應移至清單中的特定項目。

span.span: A string constant used in postback event arguments to indicate that the browser should jump to a specific item in the list.

span.span: This API is obsolete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 欄位中，這是內部的欄位，且具有值"__more*n*"，其中`n`是數字，會在轉譯期間建立。The field, which is an internal field and has the value "__more*n*", where `n` is a number, is created during rendering. 此欄位的使用方式類似欄位中，不同之處在於它會指定要在詳細資料檢視中顯示之項目的索引。This field is used like the field, except that it specifies the index of the item to display in details view. 欄位由行動控制項開發人員。The field is used by mobile control developers.
